synopsis.text: Kouya Asumi is a college student working as a part-time housekeeper for the Naruse family to earn some extra money. The Naruses consist of single father Keiichi and his young son Ichika. Keiichi works constantly to provide for Ichika, leaving him sexually frustrated as evidenced by the adult videos Asumi finds in his room. Despite Keiichi being a man, Asumi finds himself drawn to his kind personality and attractive looks. After seeing how stressful Keiichi's life is, Asumi resolves to help relieve his tension. However, Keiichi has had to dismiss previous housekeepers for catching feelings. Will Asumi be able to control himself as he gets closer to this little family? Or will secrets from Keiichi's mysterious past get in the way?
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
